it.avalz.json.elements.serializers

Class OneLineSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.avalz.json.elements.serializers.OneLineSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonSerializer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrettySerializer

    public class OneLineSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements JsonSerializer
    A simple one-line serializer. It serializes a JSON structure in one single line.
    Author:
    avalz
